package.name: snap
package.readme:
=========================== SNAP Tool Dependencies File ===========================
This file automatically installs SNAP.
======= Authors =======
Original authors for SNAP: Korf Lab - University of California, Davis
Galaxy port authors for SNAP: AAFC-MBB Group
============= Tool Wrappers =============
SNAP:
Runs SNAP Gene predictor. It is suggested to run the SNAP Training tool first. Select the genome FASTA file. check whether to predict on plus or minus strand only. Select if using pre-made .hmm file or providing your own generated from the SNAP training. Enter or select the .hmm file that will be used. A list of pre-made .hmm are shown below the tool menu. Outputs a GFF file with the gene predictions.
SNAP Training:
Trains a .hmm file to use for SNAP or Maker. Select the ZFF .dna and .ann files generated from Maker to SNAP ZFF tool or CEGMA to ZFF. Both tools are available in the Maker package. Outputs the trained .hmm file.
